name: TETCOLOR - colored tetris
description:
TETCOLOR - Color block match puzzle game. Legendary, old russian classic block game from 90s.

Oldschool fullscreen board, space style with lights and glow. Very simple and addictive. Difficult to master. 

★ Break lines / rows and earn score with original classic brick mode.
★ Destoroy colored blocks with match 3 mode.
★ Crush more blocks, get more scores.
★ Puzzle or arcade ?

FEATURES:

★ Ease controls, gamepad, joystick etc
★ Sound/music can be turned off
★ Supports any tablets
★ No time limits
★ Completely free

FEATURES(ANDROID):

★ No intrusive ads
★ No internet or wifi needed

FEATURES(WINDOWS):

✔ No extra required. DirectX, Microsoft NET, Visual c redistributable packages, etc., installed on a clean system with video drivers.

✔ After installation, the folder with the game is portable.

✔ Minimum system requirements and small size.

✔ Viruses, spyware, ads - absent.
